name: WooCommerce Print Report
author: IQComputing

sections.description:
Without this plugin WooCommerce report graphs are not easily printable. This plugin scales the report graph down to a printable size and formats the admin page to make it more printer friendly.

IQComputing

  • Like us on Facebook
  • Follow us on Twitter
  • Fork on Github
sections.installation:
WooCommerce is required to work with this plugin.

  1. Install this (WooCommerce Print Report) plugin
  2. When logged into WordPress while this plugin and WooCommerce are both active, navigate to WooCommerce -> Reports
  3. While viewing a report, a new “Print Report” button should appear next to export on the right-hand side above the graph.
sections.faq:
Where do I configure the settings for this plugin?

There are currently no settings for this plugin. If you have a feature request please open a support thread and we will look into it.
sections.changelog:
1.1 (2019-05-15)

  • Ensured support for WordPress 5.2 and the latest version of WooCommerce.

1.0 (2019-02-26)

  • Initial release of plugin.
  • Adds print link to WooCommerce Reports

short_description: Adds a print link to WooCommerce reports
